author: kpedro88
body: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-osenv/commit/2498b0520134e240960188143a2c77f03994dce0 changed how `--show-command` works internally. It is supposed to show the value of the `APPTAINER_BINDPATH` variable as well as the apptainer command (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-osenv/pull/15#issuecomment-2066869712, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-osenv/pull/15/commits/4fe606d7cefb2cd4c356bfeb655974095a82fa05). This PR restores the desired behavior.
title: restore bindpath print in --show-command
